scripts.test: pnpm run test:eslint & pnpm run test:prettier & pnpm run test:stylelint
scripts.patch: pnpm run version:eslint patch & pnpm run version:prettier patch & pnpm run version:stylelint patch
scripts.minor: pnpm run version:eslint minor & pnpm run version:prettier minor & pnpm run version:stylelint minor
scripts.major: pnpm run version:eslint major & pnpm run version:prettier major & pnpm run version:stylelint major
scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:eslint & pnpm run deploy:prettier-hyeokjae & pnpm run deploy:stylelint
